name: Dodgems
description: Driving where the aim is to violently crash into strangers and give them whiplash. Forget autonomous driving - this is a problem much better suited to AI!

name: Bumper boats
description: Dodgems except you move slower and get wet. It's unclear why this would be an advantage.

name: Funhouse
description: Neither fun nor a house. But at least the mirrors will ruin any computer vision algorithms day.

name: Ferris wheel
description: Slow circles in the sky. Lacking all entertainment you have to bring your own, either a child like wonder of the view or the lips of a lover, pickled in a jar.

name: Rollercoaster
description: Wheeeeeee. The more bats and spiders the better.

name: Carousel
description: Ride a garishly painted wooden horse as it goes around in a circle. Why the wooden horses do this is unknown.

name: Caterpillar
description: For the little ones. Much to everyone's disappointment it is not hungry and you will get them back.

name: Super loop
description: A two way roller coaster with just one loop, but at least you get to go upside down.

name: Fun slide
description: A slide that takes a poorly optimised route to the ground.

name: Hayride
description: Sit on hay bails on a trailer being dragged by a tractor while it drives around over rough terrain. Experience the joy of going to work as a farmhand without having to do any actual work.

name: Helter skelter
description: Rotating slide where you sit on a rug. No genies or machine learning allowed.

name: Toboggan
description: A very long slide, where you sit on something roughly equivalent to a food serving tray. Gravity does the rest. No actual food is served.

name: Log flume
description: A toboggan with extra water. Does not improve matters.

name: Drop tower
description: For people who want to experience the joy of a falling lift without being prosecuted for having cut the cables at their office.

name: Pirate ship
description: A ship sized and shaped swing. Does none of piracy, floating or rum.

name: Mechanical bull
description: All the danger of being thrown off an angry animal but none of the danger of being trampled, mauled or having a long conversation about Gaussian processes.

name: Reverse bungee
description: The experience of being launched from siege warfare equipment without the requirement of being a diseased carcass that goes splat.

name: Teacups
description: Spinning within spinning. A child's first opportunity to experience the warm splatter of a strangers vomit hitting them firmly in the face.

name: Rotor
description: The relevant frame of reference to believe in centripetal force. And a shotgun blast of vomit to your face while pinned helplessly to a wall.

name: Petting zoo
description: The best ones have llamas and snakes.

name: Donkey ride
description: It's all about the contrast between the sad donkey and the happy child.

name: Arcade hall
description: People are still into space invaders aren't they?

name: Tunnel of love
description: Alternatively known as death by embarrassment, unless you're about 80.

name: Chair-O-Planes
description: A swing where the top of the arc never happens, which is the best bit. Mediocre.

name: Simulator
description: A small cinema that moves in time to the overpriced single shot film being shown, to create a mild sense of G forces.

name: Bungee trampolines
description: Boing.

name: Crazy golf course
description: Nobody cares about the golf - an excuse to socialise.

name: Pub
description: Now we're talking.

name: Go karts
description: A game of actual skill, where everything vibrates.

name: Ice cream van
description: Everyone loves a sugar rush.

name: Planetarium
description: Hello universe!

name: Puny train ride
description: Why is the train so small?
